title: was using my phone just yesterday to play some songs. I got a call and it went completely blank
content: was using my phone just yesterday to play some songs. I gotba call an it went completely blqnk and unresponsive. Its been like that for 24 hours. It was very responsive befoee this issue. I've tried tp hardreset but nothing's working. It indicates that its on becauee when i place a finger on thr touch id sensor it still vibrates. Could it be a major screen issue? -
